error_msg: You must specify the data configuration parameters.
description: Upload a .json file with your dataset or a .zip file with JSON files to be uploaded.

oneOf.error_msg: Write the name of the key that constains the data.
oneOf.description: The data has to be inside a key in your JSON files. Write the name of the key that constains the data.

oneOf.error_msg: Need to specify the name of the key that defines the classes of the data.
oneOf.description: The class column has the information about the class that each data sample corresponds to. Write the name of the class column, the key in your JSON data that specify the class.

oneOf.error_msg: Need to select 'true' if you have folders that define the splits, otherwise 'false'.
oneOf.description: If your data has folders that define the splits select 'true', otherwise 'false'.

oneOf.error_msg: The size of the training set must be between 0 and 1.
oneOf.description: The training set contains the data to be used for training a model. Must be defined between 0 and 100% of the data.

oneOf.error_msg: The test set size must be between 0 and 1.
oneOf.description: The test set contains the data that will be used to evaluate a model. Must be defined between 0 and 100% of the data.

oneOf.error_msg: The validation set size must be between 0 and 1.
oneOf.description: The validation set contains the data to be used to validate a model. Must be defined between 0 and 100% of the data.

oneOf.error_msg: Must be true or false, choose if you want to shuffle the data when separating the sets.
oneOf.description: Determines whether the data will be shuffle when defining the sets or not. It must be true for shuffle the data, otherwise false.

oneOf.error_msg: Must be an integer greater than or equal to 0.
oneOf.description: A seed defines a value with which the same mixture of data will always be obtained. It must be an integer greater than or equal to 0.

oneOf.error_msg: Must be true or false, choose if you want to separate the data into sets with the same proportion of samples per class as the original set or not.
oneOf.description: Defines whether the data will be proportionally separated according to the distribution of classes in each set.
